title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view is resized smaller
OB: When a view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127 (not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the two tool items below the label move to a new line.
EB: The close button and other tool items should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of how small the view is resized. The close button should be located in the far right corner, as users are accustomed to.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Navigator view. 2. Resize the view to a smaller size. Notice that the tool items below the label move to a new line.
